summary: Standard Andragorn quality waraxes, battleaxes, battleswords (\"nagamaki\"), maces, warhammers and morningstars.
descriptionHtml:
Arms & Armour 5


DESCRIPTION:

Standard Andragorn quality waraxes, battleaxes, battleswords (\"nagamaki\"), maces, warhammers and morningstars.


DETAILS:

-Picture of every new item is uploaded.
-Items are lore friendly and balanced.
-Items are in leveled lists.
-Items can be crafted.
-Items have also been added in a barrel south of Whiterun.


ATTENTION:

-Andragorn does not talk much.
-Andragorn does not take orders.
-Andragorn\'s maps make no sense.
-Andragorn appreciates good manners.
-Andragorn allows you to use his mods
in your Skyrim mods.

INSTALLATION:

For Nexus users:
You must download and activate all mods/parts with the same name.
(When you activate the mod, the actual file names are in Finnish: Aseet ja Varusteet 5...)
For example...
Arms and Armour 5 Axes Maces (*small* file)
Arms and Armour 5 Axes Maces 1 (*big* file)
Arms and Armour 5 Axes Maces 2 (*big* file)
The small file must allways be redownloaded/updated when a new big file is downloaded, else
you won\'t see the new stuff in game.
The big files hopefully never have to be downloaded again; they contain the models & textures.
author: Andragorn
